Text.Page:
When the prions ran us out of Thunder Hold, Jabel didn't make it out. If Elinu is merciful, he's hiding out in the ruins, waiting for rescue. If not...

I can't think about that now. I just need someone to find him.
(Jabel is dead. His hands clutch a book close to his chest.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Look at the book.</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
(It's written in a language you don't recognize.)

If Jabel died for this, it had better be important.

See if Jerad can translate itâ€”he reads a dozen languages, at least.

This is the book you found on Jabel's corpse?

This was definitely written by a prion. Give me a moment...
